channel.title: Indacoin don't have Bay
channel.description:
Hi,
In your latest tweet you mentioned that we could buy Bay from your partner Indacoin. Unfortunately, when i went to their website and checked there was no Bay in their list. I even asked their support if they have Bay but they said they don't. Also, i went to https://indacoin.com/en_GB/affiliate and clicked on your logo but it directed me to https://bitbay.net/en instead. Anyway i just thought you should know.

item.title: Indacoin don't have Bay
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

Hi Bitaida,

Apologies for the late reply!
Right now you can purchase BAY from these two places:

https://novaexchange.com

http://gaiavault.org/

Gaiavault also has a fiat gateway, where you can buy/sell direct with a bank account.

Hope that helps!

Read full topic
